word: God gives the physicians of this institution skill and efficiency because they are serving Him. They know that their skill is not their own, that it comes from above. They realize that there is beside them a divine Watcher, who gives wisdom to His physicians, enabling them to move intelligently in their work. Ms 28, 1901, p. 9. ("Talk Given by Mrs. E. G. White at the Battle Creek Sanitarium," March 27, 1901.)
